casebody.data:
In the MATTER OF: E.D. No. 125PA18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 24, 2019 Wyatt B. Orsbon, Assistant Appellant Defender, for E.D. Robert T. Broughton, Assistant Attorney General, Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender, for State of North Carolina.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Respondent on the 7th of June 2019 in this matter for a writ of mandamus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Wake County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of June 2019."

Davis, J. recused
